modName: HD Charcoal for Smelter - 2K and 1K texture replacer
summary: High definition texture replacer for the charcoal pile near smelters. Available in 2K and 1K resolution
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]https://imageshack.com/scaled/large/689/62e2.jpg[/IMG]
High definition texture replacer for the charcoal pile near smelters. 
I play modded Skyrim with Hi-res texures and it was very annoying that this eyesore charcoal texture was left untouched by most HD texture packs and there are no replacers available for it yet (none that I\'m aware of). So here is a \"proper\" non-upscale HD retexture of the charcoal for smelters done with high standards.  

FEATURES:
- Realistic High Defintion 2k Charcoal Texture
- Also available in Lite Version 1K for performance

Installation:
Extract the archive contents into your Skyrim data folder, overwrite the files when prompted.
=======================================================================
Permissions:
=======================================================================
You may not upload this mod to any other site other than NEXUS
You may not use or modify the assets from this mod on your own mods without permission from the author.
[center]   
[IMG]https://imageshack.com/scaled/large/850/2a93.jpg[/IMG]
See it in-game in this Video by Hodilton:
[youtube]lSvLHDhubbU[/youtube]
[IMG]https://imageshack.com/scaled/large/543/9wpg.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://imageshack.com/scaled/large/24/d0yf.jpg[/IMG]
